name: Shortsword
description: Short swords are some of the most common weapons found in any martial society, and thus designs are extremely varied, depending on the region and creator. Most are around 2 feet in length.

name: Longsword
description: This sword is about 3-1/2 feet in length.

name: Katana
description: Specifically constructed for samurai, katanas employ multiple types of steel combined in a distinctive forging process.

name: Bastard sword
description: A bastard sword is about 4 feet in length, making it too large to use in one hand without special training; thus, requires a higher skill rank.

name: Shortbow
description: A shortbow is made up of one piece of wood about 3 feet in length.

name: Longbow
description: At almost 5 feet in height, a longbow is made up of one solid piece of carefully curved wood.
